description: Located in the heart of the lower east side, you're surrounded by many great restaurants, nightlife and entertainment venues. Our studio is less than 2 minute walk to th(URL HIDDEN)trains and only 8 minute walk to the B D express station. You can get anywhere you want in the city while saving a lot of time on commute. There are also citibike stations, which are conveniently located around almost every corner. Supermarket and Laundry is right next door.
